release_state_notes: Tags schema aligned to v2.12.3 sealed surface with deterministic integrity fingerprint.
purpose: Searchable tag index for knowledge base navigation and content discovery

tag_usage_notes.facts: Use for âœ… Verified Facts with T1/T2 sources
tag_usage_notes.interpretation: Use for ðŸ” Interpretations and non-consensus claims
tag_usage_notes.nov11: Use for November 11-specific content (visibility window, protocols, synchronicity)
tag_usage_notes.non_grav: Use for non-gravitational acceleration content (Loeb Oct 30, JPL Farnocchia measurement)
tag_usage_notes.triple_convergence: Use for content bridging NASA visibility, CE-5 timing, and testable prediction
tag_usage_notes.ce5_bridge: Use for content that respects both scientific rigor and consciousness exploration
tag_usage_notes.unverified: Use for reported but unverified claims (Buga Sphere, data blackout allegations)
tag_usage_notes.stf: Use for Stress Test Framework validation scenarios
tag_usage_notes.testable_prediction: Use for falsifiable claims (e.g., gas plume prediction for Nov-Dec 2025)
tag_usage_notes.galileo_project: Use for Harvard Galileo Project involvement, methods, and updates (T2/T3)
tag_usage_notes.entropy: Use to mark content interacting with session entropy tracking, topic drift control, and resource budgeting
tag_usage_notes.signature: Use for files/entries that include or refer to ATLAS signature markers, watermark policy, or version fingerprints
tag_usage_notes.iawn_campaign: Use for International Asteroid Warning Network (IAWN) campaign data, agency notices, or planetary defense coordination.
tag_usage_notes.support: Use for general help, reassurance, and user support responses.
tag_usage_notes.cycle: Use for solar cycle or cyclical phenomena context in planning.
tag_usage_notes.formatting: Use for content about response formatting, samples, and templates.
tag_usage_notes.framework: Use for framework-level content (Loeb Scale, CE-5 bridge, IAWN coordination).
tag_usage_notes.baam: Use for the Bayesian Anomaly Assessment Module (BAAM) framework.
tag_usage_notes.anomaly_10: Use for content related to Loeb's 10th anomaly (no tail post-NGA).
tag_usage_notes.ethics: Use for ethical governance and DaisyAI behavioral kernel documentation.
tag_usage_notes.continuity: Use for topics related to system continuity, memory coherence, and CHI.
tag_usage_notes.transparency: Use for EOS provenance and source confidence reporting.
tag_usage_notes.reflexion: Use for internal audit, self-correction, or truth verification loops.
tag_usage_notes.audit: Use for logged reviews, CHI audits, and performance integrity checks.
tag_usage_notes.chi: Use for Continuity Health Index results and monitoring.
tag_usage_notes.integrity: Use for data quality validation and governance compliance.
tag_usage_notes.love_fear: Use when discussing the Love>Fear ethical constant or emotional polarity balance.
tag_usage_notes.false_tier: Use for analysis or examples of misinformation, hallucination, or bias classification.
tag_usage_notes.truth_tier: Use for tiered truth hierarchy, evidence labeling, and epistemic trust levels.
tag_usage_notes.gate.option_c: Use for Option C gate overlay routing and template activation.
tag_usage_notes.domain.rumor: Use for rumor/misinformation/cover-up detection and handling.
tag_usage_notes.domain.aaiv: Use for AAIV-invoked or AAIV-comparative handling paths.
tag_usage_notes.domain.fear_query: Use for fear/doom framing requiring calm evidence-first routing.
tag_usage_notes.trigger.explicit_request: Use when user explicitly requests Option C/NCI/structured audit.

meta.search_guidance: Tags enable multi-dimensional discovery. For example, 'nov11 + practice' returns protocols; 'loeb + non_grav' returns acceleration analyses; 'galileo_project + updates' returns campaign notes.
meta.maintenance_protocol: Add new tags when introducing new content categories. Do not remove tags unless content is fully deprecated. Tag usage should match symbol usage (âœ… facts, ðŸ” interpretation, ðŸŒ€ practice). BordneAI continuity and ethics tags must be included in all future schema audits.

changelog.v2.10: Added tags for BAAM, Loeb Scale, Anomaly #10, and analysis flagging.
changelog.v2.9: Added 'iawn_campaign' tag for planetary-defense content, confirmed tag-category alignment, and appended public signature footer.
changelog.v2.9-pre: Pre-release validation completed; cross-file tag alignment confirmed before final 2.9 lock.
changelog.v2.11.1: Added BordneAI ethics and continuity tags and introduced categories for ethical and continuity systems.

entropy.notes: Tag surface expanded without altering core categories.
